description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Quirky four player head-to-head fighting!  Game can support anywhere from 2-4 players.  With 15 fight customization options (including many upgrades, such as: bubble shield, lucky fedora, major league fastballs, etc), game can be tailored to fit any levels of competition.  FUN gameplay, good music and backgrounds.  A classic indie brawler, built with the Herman game engine.
